Reviews.Title: NOT IMPRESSED WITH PICTURES
Reviews.Author: Atheist
Reviews.Content: The pictures this camera takes are dull, drab, and not sharp.  There was no definition to the pics.  What should I expect from a cheap camera.  It retails for $200, though, so I thought it would be good.  I think I'll try Panasonic Lumix or Canon Powershot or Kodak Easyshare next.

Reviews.Title: Bad Camera
Reviews.Author: Shell
Reviews.Content: Pictures come out awful.  Fuzzy looking, way to dark. I've owned tons of camera's and this is the worst, never had this problem with any other camera.  Their return policy is ridiculous, do not buy!

ProductInfo.Features:
10x wide angle zoom lens (28-280mm); 14.1-megapixel CCD sensor
2.7-inch LCD screen; Pentax sensor shift Shake Reduction (SR) stabilization system
Widescreen 720p HD video at 30 frames per second
Automatic shooting modes including Pentax Auto Picture
Capture images and video to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Pentax Optio RZ10 14 MP Digital Camera with 10x Optical Zoom with CCD Shift Stabilization and 2.7-Inch LCD (White)
